name: Alternative Currencies Breakfast, hosted by Circles
short_description: Join us for a cozy breakfast gathering to discuss newer forms of money that are better and fairer, with the opportunity to be among the first to be onboarded to Circles.
description:
**Alternative Currencies Breakfast, hosted by Circles @ ETHPrague**

Bitcoin promised to be a new censorship resistant form of money, but it turned out to be a store of value rather than a medium of exchange.

We're hosting a breakfast for those working on, and those interested in learning more about newer forms of money that are better and fairer.

Join us for a cozy breakfast gathering to discuss these topics with like-minded folks over coffee and good food.

All attendees will get a chance to be one of the first ones to be onboarded to Circles, a new fairer form of money launched on 21st May 2025, right on the spot.

Our co-founder **Friederike Ernst** will also be joining us - if you watched her talk the day before (or even if you missed it), come meet her in person and continue the conversation.

More about us: www.aboutcircles.com

venue.name: Bubenské nábř. 306/13
venue.address: Bubenské nábř. 306/13, Hlavní město Praha, Hlavní město Praha
